job.title: Data Scientist (Predictive Analytics)
job.description: pFocus Capital is supporting itsnbsphealth technology group by providing an effective Data Scientist who will work to develop stateoftheart predictive analytic data models to optimize revenue opportunities for the marketing and sales teamsppbrppThis ideal candidate must be technical and capable of driving digital innovation among the data engineers while also capable of interfacing with business stakeholders and conducting predictive modelsppbrppThis role will start remotely however at some point in the future we will want someone who can come in once every 1015 days Therefore you must be local to NY or NJ or open to relocatingppnbspppstrongThe total compensation and benefits offered are completely unmatched in the industrystrongppnbspppstrongMINIMUM REQUIREMENTSnbspstrongpulli3 years as a data scientistliliExperience building predictive models in Python and its frameworks ie Pandas PySpark etcliliProfessional experience deploying machine learning modelsliliPrior experience with Spark and SQLliliExperience with Random Forest Logistic Regression Linear Regression supervised and unsupervised models etcliliExperience in a cloud environment ie AWS or AzureliliAzure Databricks experience is a plusliliAbility to translate complex mathematical models and data science concepts into business decisions and vice versaliliMasters degree in computer science statistics or engineering or 5 years of experienceliul
